boardgame.name: Safranito
boardgame.description: From the publisher Zoch:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Safranito_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; is an extraordinary action-filled game that challenges skillful tactics as well as tactical dexterity._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Like no other game before, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Safranito_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; is a combination of dexterity and tactics providing the game with a new, superb playing experience. At an Indian spice booth, the players bargain for the precious ingredients they need for their exquisite meals. Thereby, everyone throws their Indian coins face-down onto the bowls depicted on the game board. The players may bluff and push the opponents_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo; coins aside. A clever coin thrower is able to arrange the coins on the game board in a way that allows him to do both: sell his spices at a high price and purchase cheap spices as well. Eventually, the first player wins who has been able to acquire the spices needed to serve the maharajah his desired meal._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Shipping costs depend on size and weight of the parcel and destination. Payment: Within EU I prefer the EU-standard-bank-tranfer (SEPA,IBAN/BIC). It is fast and causes no fees. Outside EU Paypal and bank-transfer are possible.

Game is in mint condition and is complete and sorted (in mini-ziplocs, except if there is a sorting tray). I need to make space and get rid of games I am unlikely to play in the future. Please check my other listings! If you buy more than US$100 worth of games, I will give $10 off shipping. If you buy more than $200 worth of games, I will ship the games for free (in the continental US only)! Games are being sold because I have an updated edition or am unlikely to play again in the future due to my group’s preferences. Happy shopping!
